title.rendered: OKX Review, How To Create OKX Account

content.rendered:
OKX is an international cryptocurrency exchange with low fees. While it’s not available to users in the United States, it could be a good choice for others looking to buy, stake, and trade a large number of currencies.

Table of Contents

  • What is OKX?
  • Key Features & Advantages of OKX
  • OKX Review
    • Pros:
    • Cons:
  • How To Create OKX Account (OKX Review)
    • How to Sign up an OKEx Account

What is OKX?

OKX Review, OKX is a relatively newer cryptocurrency exchange, developed specifically to make crypto trading advanced and efficient. Since its founding in the year 2017, the platform has added countless features, payment methods, cryptocurrencies, and markets in order to cope up with the traders’ and investors’ demands. The best thing is, OKX is not just a simple crypto exchange, but offers something more.

Create OKX Account

OKX Review, How To Create OKX Account

Users can also access OKX DEFI HUB, which makes it very convenient for them to check out their funds and assets in a single place with a decentralized finance management system. Based in Seychelles, OKX employs more than 1000 people from all over the world in order to ensure perfect functionality and experience.

  • Web Address: www.okx.com

  • Main location: Seychelles

  • Cryptocurrencies: BTC, ETH, SOL, DOT, ADA, DOGE & 250+ more

  • Fiat Currencies: USD, AUD, JPY, CAD, PKR, CNY, EUR, GBP & more

  • Deposit Methods: Bank Transfer, SEPA, Visa/Mastercard, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Cryptocurrency

  • Deposit Fees: Varies

  • Trading Fees: Maker: 0.08%, Taker: 0.1%

  • Mobile app: Yes

Create OKX Account

Key Features & Advantages of OKX

OKX comes with tremendous benefits and advantages that many platforms fail to deliver to their users. This is certainly what makes OKX a great choice for all types of traders to start trading and investing their money in cryptocurrencies.

If you are wondering what these benefits and advantages actually are, you can take a look below.

  • Instant crypto buy and sell

  • Over 250+ cryptocurrencies available

  • Apps for mobile and desktop users

  • Low trading fees with further discounts 

  • Many deposit and withdrawal methods available

  • P2P trading included

  • Easy crypto conversions or swaps

  • Passive income through HODLing

  • Professional market charts available for traders

  • Borrowing option enabled

  • Secure DEFI HUB

  • NFT marketplace

  • Great customer support and educational content

OKX Review

Pros:

  • Over 250+ cryptocurrencies available
  • Low trading fees
  • NFT marketplace where you can buy and sell NFTs
  • Crypto borrowing and staking supported
  • P2P trading available

Cons:

  • High deposit and withdrawal fees
  • Not supported in the USA

How To Create OKX Account (OKX Review)

How to Sign up an OKEx Account

1: Go to OKX website and click on the “Sign Up” button on top right.

Create OKX Account

2: Choose your preferred registration method – phone number or email.

Register with email

You’ll be asked for the following information and click “Sign up”.

  1. Email address.
  2. Password.
  3. Invite Code (you can request an invitation code from the one who invited you and fill it in. If no invitation code is available, it’s ok to leave it blank.)

Input the code which OKEx sent to your email address.

Account has been created successfully.

Register with phone

You’ll be asked for the following information and click “Sign up”.

  1. Phone.
  2. Password.
  3. Invite Code (you can request an invitation code from the one who invited you and fill it in. If no invitation code is available, it’s ok to leave it blank.)

Input the code which OKEx sent to your phone.

Account has been created successfully.
